title: The Ugly duckling
creator_credit: Joy Batchelor, John Halas and Halas and Batchelor Cartoon Films
brief_description: Rejected by the other ducks, the ugly duckling can only find happiness when he grows up and finds that he is not a duck at all. Animated by Harold Whitaker.
creator_credit_for_label: Joy Batchelor, John Halas and Halas and Batchelor Cartoon Films
description: Rejected by the other ducks, the ugly duckling can only find happiness when he grows up and finds that he is not a duck at all. Animated by Harold Whitaker.
